item.title: Distant-G4vin [chillstep,trapish, future bass]
item.dc:creator: Andrew_Adams
item.description:
Hey man! Youâ€™ve got a good start. I would recommend adding in some chords, and other stuff to make it sound more layered and full. Also it could be a little more structured. Maybe use more automation and stuff to keep it a little more dramatic instead of having only like a new drum come in once it changes scenes. Just some ideas to maybe consider, but keep it up man! Youâ€™ve got a good start
